title: Village Wrought Iron 2 ft Snowflake Snow Gauge Yard Stake
features: For the outdoor décor lover, these charming hand crafted snow gauges make the perfect addition to your snowy landscape. The black coating, large numbers and sweet silhouette on top makes reading easy against the snow. Place near a window so you can glance out, read the snow gauge without venturing outside.
flat powder coating finish :: lead free, long lasting & rust resistant
Hand crafted wrought iron product for indoor or outdoor use. Includes mounting screws.
MADE in the USA :: Supporting United States craftsman.
